lines:
Have you heard from Tommy lately? |

I haven't.

I supJose he is working hard

after all,

I have just finished ny first

semester work,

I did better than I expected

in the exams., flunked one (Applied Mechanics) 
ans passed ten with an average of 'P'. Some

record to be proud of, especially for me.

This term finds me working my head off, and

I must do better still,

Sometimes I think

it is anuisance to study when I must sit up

till two or three in the morning for preparae

tion.

I am somewhat inclined to thinj it if

not worth the trouble to undergo such hards

ship. 
you?

You agree with my philosophy, don't

Yours very sincerely,

Staran
raw: Have you heard from Tommy lately? | I haven't. I supJose he is working hard after all, I have just finished ny first semester work, I did better than I expected in the exams., flunked one (Applied Mechanics) ans passed ten with an average of 'P'. Some record to be proud of, especially for me. This term finds me working my head off, and I must do better still, Sometimes I think it is anuisance to study when I must sit up till two or three in the morning for preparae tion. I am somewhat inclined to thinj it if not worth the trouble to undergo such hards ship. you? You agree with my philosophy, don't Yours very sincerely, Staran

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter inviting Stearns to give a talk at the MIT Cosmopolitan Club at an informal evening smoker. Kwan asks if Stearns has heard from Tommy and states that first semester went well. He studies long hours and questions whether such hardship" is worth the trouble.""etter inviting Stearns to give a tal"
